actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-761.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes supplemental expenditures by the Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs for inquiries and investigations. Limits the expenses of the committee under this resolution to $353,800 (now $288,800 pursuant to S.Res. 260, 93d Congress), of which amount not to exceed $15,000 may be expended for the procurement of the services of individual consultants or organizations.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs for inquiries and investigations.
